name: Car Drift - Max Racing Legends
description:
Latest Release By Gears In Motion

Car Drift - Max Racing Legends

Car Drift Max Racing Legends is the best mobile drifting category game. These days finding a worth while drifting game on store is very difficult. We as a promising developer present you this realistic drifting game of 2018.

We are providing 3 different modes first one is the timer mode in which you have score as much as possible with in the given time. Second mode is the sprint drifting mode in which you have drift as much as possible before reaching the finish line. Third mode is the training mode in which you can drift as much as you like but don't forget to save your score before leaving by pressing the pause button and then save.

We are giving our users full customization of their vehicles. They can easily change wheel rims available up to 10 types of different hot wheels. You can easily change the body color, tire smoke color, rim color. Give your vehicle a dashing look by adjusting its height, rear wheel camber and front wheel camber.

Change you car engine performance and drifting angles in game play by pressing the orange "Drift Settings" Button.

Features:
- 8 heavy power vehicles
- 4 Realistic Drifting Environment
-Car customization to give your vehicle a visual overhaul
-10 different wheel rims
-Body Colors
-Tyre Smoke color changer
-Wheel rim color Changer
-Car Suspension (Rear Camber, Front Camber, Vehicle Height)
-3 different interesting Modes
-Different Car behaviors
-And much more
